text: East Tennessee State University is a public university in Johnson City, Tennessee. The university has about 15,000 students. It was founded in 1911. The current president of the university is Brian Noland. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Buccaneers. They have 18 varsity teams, most of which compete in the Southern Conference. The football team, which will resume play in 2015 after a 12-year absence, will play the 2015 season as an independent (not in a conference). ==Other websites== * East Tennessee State University's Official website * East Tennessee State Buccaneers' Official athletics website Category:Colleges and universities in Tennessee Category:1911 establishments in the United States Category:20th- century establishments in Tennessee Category:Tri-Cities, Tennessee
title: East Tennessee State University
